scripts.build: npx browserslist@latest --update-db && rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/components/atoms/ --out-dir dist/components/atoms --copy-files && NODE_ENV=production babel src/components/molecules/ --out-dir dist/components/molecules --copy-files  && NODE_ENV=production babel src/components/organisms/ --out-dir dist/components/organisms --copy-files
